name: Cat Tiles
description:
*Early prototype*

Short minimalistic puzzle game about cute cats

How to play:

  1. Click on cats in the bottom of the screen to pick a color
  2. Click on tiles you want to color.  Any adjacent tiles of same color will also be colored.
  3. Number of tiles on the field should match the number of tiles on top.

Press F1 for fullscreen.

Game made by Dmytro Ruchko
